forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let p := MF.Iter_upb m x_1 in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> i < p -> expf (B m zero x) x_1 z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0 => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
dart = nat : Set
expf_B0_CS_1_a_prel1 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let p := MF.Iter_upb m x_1 in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in xb0 = Iter (cF m) j x_1 -> i <= j < p -> expf (B m zero x) x_1 z
expf_B0_CS_1_c_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x0 xb0 -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (B m zero x) z t

expf_B0_CS_1_a_prel2 : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m x_1 z xb0 -> expf (B m zero x) x_1 z
expf_B0_CS_1_a : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 -> expf (B m zero x) z t

expf_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t

expf_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf (L m zero x y) z t

diff_x_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in ~ expf m x y0 -> 0 < i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i x <> x

cF_L1_y_1_x10 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i j : nat), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let dx := MF.degree m x in let m1 := L m one x y in y0 = Iter (cF m) j x -> expf m x y0 -> j < dx - 1 -> j + 1 + i <= dx - 1 -> Iter (cF m1) i y_1 = Iter (cF m) (j + 1 + i) x
MF.unicity_mod_p : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (j k : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := MF.Iter_upb m z in j < p -> k < p -> Iter (MF.f m) j z = Iter (MF.f m) k z -> j = k

```  
intros m x i Hmap Hsucc x0 x_1 xb0 p z H1 H2.
unfold expf, inv_hmap, MF.expo, prec_L in *.
intros [Hmap_m Hprecm] Hsucc_x.
intros H3 H4.
unfold expf, inv_hmap, MF.expo, prec_L.
intros [Hmap_m1 [Hmap_m2 Hprecm1]].
intros [Hmap_L [Hminx [Hmaxx [Hminy Hmaxy]]].
unfold expf, inv_hmap, MF.expo in H1, H2.
split.
- apply H1.
- intros H5.
  destruct H4 as [H4|[H4|H4]].
  + left. split.
    * apply H3.
    * apply H4.
  + right. left. split.
    * apply H4.
    * apply H5.
  + right. right. split.
    * apply H5.
    * apply H4.
Qed.
```
